item.title: How to run a client i need help
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

That one should work, have you installed it? If you’ve installed it and it still doesn’t work, edit your compile.bat file to look like this:

@echo off java -Xmx2500m server pause
If it still doesn’t work, you need to edit your PATH.

Read full topic
